BSpline2D - Class in shapes3d.path
This class defines a Bezier spline in 2D space that passes through a set of given points (called knots).
BSpline2D(float[], float[], int) - Constructor for class shapes3d.path.BSpline2D
Creates a Bezier spline using two arrays for the x and y positions for each control point (z = 0).
If the arrays passed to this constructor differ in length the extra in the longer array are ignored.

BSpline3D - Class in shapes3d.path

drawMode(int) - Method in class shapes3d.Shape3D
The draw mode can be either
S3D.SOLID - solid color as set with fill() method
S3D.WIRE - wire frame colour and wire thickness set with stroke() and strokeWeight() methods
S3D.TEXTURE - an image or movie is used to fill the shape
or any combination by or'ing them together e.g.
